ygData.subject: Re: UGuk Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The druid cast a beneficial spell on a player the mob was fighting.  That added the druid to the mob s hate list regardless of faction. ... Your starting
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 8 Jan 2000, Brangwen wrote:
>
> our druids was going to cast invis/see invis on him (and see invis on the
> rest of us) when he's attacked by something, and one of our druids casts see
> invis on him exactly the same time. Then the creatures started attacking us!
>
> So: Did they attack us because one of the druids cast see invis on him while
> he was defending himself??? Our 21mage stayed back and didn't do anything

The druid cast a beneficial spell on a player the mob was
fighting. That added the druid to the mob's hate list
regardless of faction.

> while we helped our "guide" defend himself but the 29druid, and myself DID
> help (actually, I had to defend myself, because, when they turned to attack,
> they attacked me and the 29druid). The 26 druid also helped by joining in
> the fight, yet her faction didn't seem to be affected (i.e. she can stand in
> there uninvised and not be attacked). And, the mage's faction took no hits
> whatsoever. Anyway, anyone have any ideas what was going on with this? Oddly

Your starting faction with the frogs seems to depend on your
race (and possibly diety). Some people start off KOS, some
are just one kill away, some require several kills first.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
